points: When I was in senior high school, I had translated a calligraphy handbook(Palmer Method 1935) in to Chinese, which was first shared in Cursive of Baidu Post Bar;
I'm taking a craftsman's heart to design and develop web applications, dreamming to become a software engineer for spacecraft.

frontEnd: Master Javascript/HTML5/CSS3; Can using pure Javascript to develop applications.
No problem with Git&Linux for daily use.

schools.institution: Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications

items: Excellence prize of The First Continental Code Optimization University Competition(2016.07)
Second prize of Chongqing University students "Chinese soul" reading activities essay contest(2014.07)

items.title: Hexo Theme Ambition
details: These hexo themes on the official site are not my tea, that's why I build another theme. Deployed ServiceWorker javascript to provide a better experience while users are offline. Learned stylus. You may visit my blog to see what does it look like.

items.title: HiYouth Volunteer Travel Official Website
details: Developed the whole site with jQuery/RequireJS technologies. In the 1st week, I'm in charged of slicing PSD into HTML. In the 2nd week, I'm involved in logic coding and debugging. At the end of the 3rd week, we debuged the API of the server. In the 4th week, I'm taking charged of making the website into responsable design. Later, added QQ link API on the login page.

items.headline: Designed product _Omerta_, a multi-user chat room application in j2me using Sun Wireless Toolkit platform.
points: Was awarded 1<sup>st</sup> position for the product in [Envision](http://www.ecell-iitkgp.org/envision.php), Product Innovation Contest, IIT KGP.
Was awarded 1<sup>st</sup> position for the product in Javawise, J2ME s/w Development Contest at IIT Kharagpur, 2008 and 2009 continuously.

vocabulary.thanks_words: Thanks for taking the time to read my resume and look forward to have the opportunity to work with you.
